text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Whoaa～～～! That shaking thing that 
bartenders do always looks so cool!!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
A perfect opportunity. If you're fine 
with a make-believe Bacchus, I shall 
serve you a drink.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Let's see, a mocktail that you'd like… 
How about an Alice? Its taste is mellow 
and goes down easy.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Alice? Like the one from wonderland…?
Ehh!! Something that cute doesn't suit
me!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
T-That's not it!! I just mean that
instead of something sweet and cute,
I'd prefer……

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Something cool that's 
stimulating and intense!!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Hohh…… You want something dry, do you? In that case, maybe a Virgin Mojito…… But I must say ——

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Heheh, my recipe's quite convincing. 
Can you handle it?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
So… you're asking if my tastes are
"mature" enough……? Bring it on! I'm
gonna be the most mature horsegirl
around!!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
You willingly want to carve out a
path of tribulations? Ahahaha!! How
interesting!! That's how you should
be, Vodka!!
